name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Conway's Game of Life - Dynamic Chrome Theme

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension turns the background of your new tab page into a game of life while maintaining a nice simple search bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An innovative theme for chrome that turns your browser into a simulation of life. A customizable experience allowing you to change the colors of the background and the player. With no in app purchases and no data collection, this extension is perfect for everyone.
